abilitiesRevealed.description: The user can restart their own heart if it stops beating by using electrical pulses, essentially performing self-defibrillation. This allows recovery from what would normally be fatal cardiac arrest.

firstUse.context: Enel revives himself after Wyper's Reject Dial stopped his heart

abilitiesRevealed.description: The user strikes one of the drums on their back to create a bird-shaped lightning discharge with 30 million volts that attacks opponents. Named after the thunder god in Iroquois mythology.

firstUse.context: Enel defeats Wyper with this technique

abilitiesRevealed.description: The user taps one of their shoulder drums to create a large wolf-shaped mass of lightning that lunges at opponents with an electrifying bite. Named after a thunder beast from Japanese folklore.

firstUse.context: Enel defeats Zoro with this technique

weaknesses.description: Seastone can neutralize the Goro Goro no Mi's powers, allowing the user to be harmed by physical attacks.
weaknesses.demonstration: Wyper uses Seastone to hold Enel in place and stop his heart with the Reject Dial.
